name: Ken Rutledge
text:
Good people
Professional and unloaded me quickly

name: Thomas McGill
text: Nice people and great quality brick.

name: Howard Jones
text: I've been waiting to unload my TRL for 5 hours now way under staffed will not ever pick up another load for this place

name: Donald Rhodes
text: At work use to love it no good supervisors will run good worker's away

name: kleva sole
text: I'm and out fairly quick. No nonsense!

name: Ron Williams
text: It's easy to find. Quick loading and friendly people. Just remember to check in before heading to the docks

name: Empress Lights
text: I love the earthy smell in the air of the bricks being baked...it makes my day quite pleasant!

name: kalyn montague
text: Loaded quikly, friendly people.

name: heather Rainee
text: Great to work with

name: paul muad' dib
text: Good product.  Nice people.

name: Larry Crews
text: Picked up here several times and it rarely takes an hour to be back on the road.

name: Chris Miller
text: This place is the most helpful brick company in Madison!  David Girardi is absolutely the most knowledgeable person in his profession!  Made the masonry purchasing experience pleasant.

name: Butch Maddox
text: They have just about everything you need

name: TR
text: I purchased a small number of in stock bricks, 100 of them. They loaded the bricks into the truck, then by hand we set the bricks on their side so they would not fall over, however  some of the bricks came loose. I noticed that the bricks where not quite what I wanted. So i talked to a person inside and I was told they have a no refund policy, once the bricks are loaded and set on their side, no refund. We had not even left the brick yard. I feel this is a terrible policy.

name: Bart Caswell
text: I just needed 3 bricks to fix my ditch guard.  They didn't have the color scheme I needed in stock but gave me 4 of a similar color for free.

name: R Mack
text: Takes 5 hrs to take off 15 pallets. The idiot there doesn't know how to drive a lift

name: Gary Hill
text: Friendly knowledgeable staff in the office. Yard people got me loaded up very quickly.

name: Edna Pruitt
text: If ur looking to buy great quality brick then Ragland Clay Products is the way to go.

name: Jack Oliver
text: Just the good ole boyss.

name: Rex Carter
text: Place to be employed

name: Frank Tipton
text: Good Service and selection of bricks

name: Davi Marshall
text: Polite people who load quickly
